name: Spicy Poached Apples
keywords: apple, apple cider, low-fat, side dish
recipeIngredient: 1/8 teaspoon each of ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground nutmeg and freshly ground pepper
2 large Granny Smith apples, peeled and cored, each cut into 8 pieces lengthwise, each piece carved into a half moon

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, combine the spices, apple cider and wine and bring to a boil. Simmer gently for 5 minutes. Add the apples, take the pan off the heat and set aside at room temperature for up to 2 hours before serving with the duck.
